page.title: 05KINGSTON FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: This project is about KINGSTON F.C. It started in 1971 by JOHN HARTRIDGE, DAVID BURRELL, DAVID KNIGHT, GEOFFRY YATES, MICHAEL RICHARDS and WILLIAM HEAD.The clubs proper name is Kingston Village Football Club but everybody knows it as Kingston Kestrels. The club is sponsored by an unknown person,Beards Brewery,and Intersport of Lewes.Kingston has a manager for each team.The pitches used by the club are St.Pancras Green and the village green they are both owned by the Parish Council.The under seventeens and the under fourteens play at the Priory,that is owned by the E.S.C.C. Last year nine boys in the under elevens team played in the Lewes District schools team.They made it to the final of the Sussex school boys knockout cup but were beaten by Eastbourne four nil.
